spec_data.Name: wordxtr
spec_data.Description:
This package will help you to create hunspell dictionary for given
input language and plain text unicode data files.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 12:25:57 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Create hunspell dictionary from given plain text input data files
